price: 7 Quiconque aura accompli une once de bien le verra.
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
